com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.swing
Class TerminalAppearance

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.swing.TerminalAppearance

public class TerminalAppearance
extends Object

This class will describe how a SwingTerminal is to be visually presented. You can create custom objects of this class to control how you want your SwingTerminal to look.

Author:
Martin
See Also:
SwingTerminal
